mapper.select: select count(*) from psp_check_task task left join qz_iesb_for_ecif ecif on task.cus_id = ecif.client_no where 1 = 1 and task.approve_status='0' and ecif.user_Id=#{userId} and ecif.CLIENT_NO is not null

select count(*) from psp_check_task task inner join qz_iesb_for_ecif ecif on task.cus_id = ecif.client_no where 1 = 1 and task.approve_status='0' and trunc(sysdate-to_date(task.TASK_CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')) > #{limitdate} and ecif.CLIENT_NO is not null and ecif.user_id = #{userId}

with circle as ( select CIRCLE.*,CAI.PRODUCT_ID,bci.user_id as manager_id,pa.product_name from CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO cai left join QZ_IESB_FOR_CIRCLE circle on CAI.id = CIRCLE.APPLICATION_ID left join BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION bci on cai.customer_id = bci.id left join product_attribute pa on CAI.PRODUCT_ID = pa.id where CAI.STATUS = 'approved' ), users as ( select user_id from ACCOUNT_MANAGER_PARAMETER where id in (SELECT mbm.child_id FROM manager_belong_map mbm LEFT JOIN account_manager_parameter amp ON amp. ID = mbm.parent_id WHERE amp.user_id = #{userId}) union select #{userId} as user_id from dual ), endDateList as (select count(*) as endDateNum,circle.manager_id from psp_check_task task inner join circle on task.cus_id = circle.client_no where 1 = 1 and task.approve_status='0' and trunc(sysdate-to_date(task.TASK_CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')) > #{enddate} AND circle.manager_id in (select user_id from users) group by circle.manager_id),
remindDateList as (select count(*) as remindDateNum,circle.manager_id from psp_check_task task inner join circle on task.cus_id = circle.client_no where 1 = 1 and task.approve_status='0' and trunc(sysdate-to_date(task.TASK_CREATE_DATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')) > #{reminddate} AND circle.manager_id in (select user_id from users) group by circle.manager_id)
select su.display_name as userName,nvl(endDateList.endDateNum,0) as endDateNum,nvl(remindDateList.remindDateNum,0) as remindDateNum from users left join sys_user su on su.id = users.user_id left join endDateList on users.user_id = endDateList.manager_id left join remindDateList on users.user_id = remindDateList.manager_id
